name: SnowWhite and the 7 Dwarfs - Cards Match Game - Jigsaw Puzzle - Book (Lite)
name_original: SnowWhite and the 7 Dwarfs - Cards Match Game - Jigsaw Puzzle - Book (Lite)
description:
SnowWhite is a wonderful storybook multilingual, illustrated by Adriana Piedras, with text and narrations that your kids will love. This is the lite version, so you will find the first pages of the book, and if you like it, the book can be purchased within the app.

Two games are included, a Memory Match & Jigsaw puzzle, your kids will love it.

Features:

1) Automatic navigation and narration make it very simple to use.
2) Simple story for the little ones, easy to read.
3) Several languages supported: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, and Russian.
4) Narrated by a native speaker on each language.
5) Illustrated characters especially for your little ones.
6) A fun and challenging Memory Match game to increase your children's brain activity.
7) A Jigsaw puzzle game to have even more fun.

Did I mention about the amazing images?

Enjoy.
